name: Orochi No Noroi
description:
Play as a Ninja who defends himself against the curse of the Serpent Demon - Orochi. Fight off the determined demon snakes using your shuriken maneuvers.

This game was made in a week, as part of my participation in the Game Jam hosted by 8Bits-To-Infinity.

I hope you enjoy.
Thanks to 8Bits for hosting the Game Jam!
